metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11724 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenResty before 1.15.8.4. ngx_http_lua_subrequest.c allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ngx.location.capture API.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11724` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnginx-mod-http-auth-pam - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-cache-purge - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-dav-ext - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-echo - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-fancyindex - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-geoip - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-geoip2 - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-headers-more-filter - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-image-filter - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-lua - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-ndk - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-perl - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-subs-filter - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-uploadprogress - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-upstream-fair - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-http-xslt-filter - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-mail - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-nchan - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-rtmp - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
libnginx-mod-stream - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
nginx - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
nginx-common - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
nginx-core - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3

nginx-light - 1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> The lua module is included in the debian directory as it is not part of the upstream nginx release. It is included in the nginx-extras binary package in universe.

criterions.comment: nginx package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.0-0ubuntu1.3').
